sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { getDetail } from '../actions' import '../css/detail.css' const Detail = (props) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() let id = props.match.params.id useEffect(() => { dispatch(getDetail(id)) }, [dispatch]) const myPokemon = useSelector((state) => state.detail) const pokemon = myPokemon? myPokemon[0] : console.log(myPokemon) return (

{pokemon.name}

{pokemon.id}

Pokem√≥nID

) } export default Detail /*
{ pokemon?

{pokemon.name}

Estadisticas de Vida

Pokemon numero: {pokemon.id}

Vida: {pokemon.life}

{ pokemon.type.length === 1 ?

Tipo: {pokemon.type[0]}

: <>

Tipo: {pokemon.type[0]}

Tipo: {pokemon.type[1]}

}

Tipo: {}

Estadisticas de combate:

Defensa: {pokemon.defense}

Ataque: {pokemon.attack}

Velocidad: {pokemon.velocity}

Peso: {pokemon.weight}

Altura: {pokemon.height}

:

Cargando...

}
*/
